TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Rfc2898DeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 通过使用基于 的伪随机数生成器，实现基于密码的密钥派生功能 (PBKDF2)。

span.span: Implements password-based key derivation functionality, PBKDF2, by using a pseudo-random number generator based on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用密码、 salt 值和迭代次数，并再生成密钥通过调用方法。 takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. RFC 2898 包括用于创建从密码和 salt 的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. PBKDF2，基于密码的密钥派生函数，可用于派生密钥使用的伪随机函数，允许的长度几乎没有限制，生成的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于生成派生的密钥来自基项和其他参数。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中，基本密钥是密码和其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2898 中，"PKCS #5： 基于密码的 Cryptography Specification Version 2.0 中，"上提供[征求意见文档网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整详细信息，请参阅部分 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿硬编码在源代码中的密码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用从程序集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来创建两个完全相同的密钥类。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然后，它将进行加密和解密使用密钥的某些数据。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

summary.span: 通过使用密码和 salt 值派生密钥，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password and salt to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必须为 8 个字节或更大。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包括用于创建从密码和 salt 的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. PBKDF2，基于密码的密钥派生函数，可用于派生密钥使用的伪随机函数，允许的长度几乎没有限制，生成的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于生成派生的密钥来自基项和其他参数。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中，基本密钥是密码和其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2898 中，"PKCS #5： 基于密码的 Cryptography Specification Version 2.0 中，"上提供[征求意见文档网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整详细信息，请参阅部分 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿硬编码在源代码中的密码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用从程序集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来创建两个完全相同的密钥类。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然后，它将进行加密和解密使用密钥的某些数据。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password, a salt, and number of iterations to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必须为 8 个字节或更大和迭代次数必须是大于零。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger and the iteration count must be greater than zero. 建议的最小迭代数为 1000年。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. RFC 2898 包括用于创建从密码和 salt 的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. PBKDF2，基于密码的密钥派生函数，可用于派生密钥使用的伪随机函数，允许的长度几乎没有限制，生成的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于生成派生的密钥来自基项和其他参数。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中，基本密钥是密码和其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2898 中，"PKCS #5： 基于密码的 Cryptography Specification Version 2.0 中，"上提供[征求意见文档网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整详细信息，请参阅部分 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿硬编码在源代码中的密码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用从程序集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

The derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函数是加密 API 函数 CryptDeriveKey() 的包装，旨在提供与使用加密 API 的应用程序的互操作性。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果`keySize`参数设置为 0 位，使用指定的算法的默认密钥大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used.

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用基于的伪随机数生成器实现 PBKDF2 功能。The class implements PBKDF2 functionality by using a pseudorandom number generator based on . 类用于提取密码、 salt 值和迭代次数，并再生成密钥对的调用通过方法。The class takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. 重复的调用此方法将不会生成相同的密钥;相反，追加的两个调用方法替换`cb`的参数值`20`等效于调用方法一次与`cb`的参数值`40`。Repeated calls to this method will not generate the same key; instead, appending two calls of the method with a `cb` parameter value of `20` is the equivalent of calling the method once with a `cb` parameter value of `40`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以获取实例键。The following example shows how to use the method to get the key for an instance of . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#2)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的迭代数。

The number of iterations for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 迭代次数是执行操作的次数。Iteration count is the number of times an operation is performed. 对于此方法的计数应是大于零。For this method, the count should be greater than zero. 建议的最小迭代数为 1000年。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示使用中生成密钥的迭代次数。The following example shows how to use the property to display the number of iterations used in the generation of the key. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#3)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果修改 salt 或迭代计数，会自动调用此方法。This method is automatically called if the salt or iteration count is modified. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt，一组随机字节，用于使未经授权的消息更难解密。Salt, a random set of bytes, is used to make unauthorized decrypting of a message more difficult. 字典攻击是一种攻击，攻击者试图通过比较以前计算的加密值的最可能的密钥的加密的值解密已加密的邮件。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 这种攻击是通过要困难得多的 salt，或随机字节，末尾的密码，然后密钥派生简介。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of salt, or random bytes, at the end of the password before the key derivation.

exception.span: 指定的 salt 大小小于 8 字节。

span.span: The specified salt size is smaller than 8 bytes.
The salt is .
